alt: Classic Eggs Benedict with Smoked Salmon
description: This delightful dish features perfectly poached eggs, nestled atop a layer of premium smoked salmon and a toasted English muffin. The creamy hollandaise sauce, made in-house, is draped generously over the eggs, delivering a silky richness that elevates every bite.

alt: Glazed Salmon with Asparagus Risotto and Balsamic Reduction
description: A beautifully seared salmon filet glazed with a sweet and tangy cherry reduction, served atop a creamy asparagus risotto that perfectly balances flavors and textures. Perfect for a gourmet dining experience, this dish combines the freshness of seasonal vegetables with the richness of premium salmon.

alt: This creative sushi platter offers a delightful fusion of visual and culinary artistry
description: Fresh cherry tomatoes, smoked salmon, and perfectly seasoned rice come together harmoniously, complemented by crisp lettuce and aromatic herbs. A sprinkle of black sesame seeds and a touch of soy sauce enhance the flavors, making every bite a masterpiece.
Golden, crispy fries are topped with creamy, rich cheese sauce, aromatic truffle, and crunchy roasted bacon. A perfect combination of textures and flavors that will leave you craving more.

This vibrant herb salad features a base of fresh green vegetables, colorful cherry tomatoes, pomegranate seeds, and crunchy almonds. Tossed in a homemade herb dressing, itâ€™s refreshing, nutritious, and a celebration of natural flavors.

This traditional butter curry tofu dish features tender tofu cubes smothered in a rich and creamy butter curry sauce, served over fluffy white rice. A sprinkle of fresh cilantro adds a refreshing touch to this comforting meal.
